text:
"Jungle Cubs" is an animated Disney television series. It is based on "The Jungle Book" movie. The series was first shown from October 5, 1996 to January 10, 1998. It had a total of 21 episodes.
Video Chile: ADV Garantía Original Video.
Three VHS cassettes containing 11 episodes of the series were released on the Argentinian in Chilean.
Video Chile: ADV Garantía Original Video.
Three DVDs containing 11 episodes of the series were released on the Argentinian in Chilean.
